Name: IsoBoom
About the game: IsoBoom is a 2D isometric puzzle game about a small robot named SE01. The protagonist gets sent to a maze of puzzles as a punishment for theft. SE01 was promised forgiveness if he manages to beat the maze and escape. You will face various puzzles starting from simply pushing artifact boxes to the right places and ending up on pushing and destroying crates using your bombs as well as having to use different contraptions. IsoBoom consists of: 25 Mind-Boggling Levels Steam Achievements Map Editor (Steam Workshop support for custom levels)
